quest.name: Wouldn't Hurt a Fly
journal: This mild-mannered Mol needs the aid of a warrior.
objectives: Survey the designated location and slay any beasts that appear.

dialogue.name: GENTLEMAN02800
dialogue.text: You there! You look like you have slain a beast or two.

dialogue.name: GENTLEMAN02800
dialogue.text: I was told today by the udgan that the gods want me to slay a beast by the Dusk Throne.

dialogue.name: GENTLEMAN02800
dialogue.text: However, I have never even killed an insect. And I am certainly far too weak to take on any of the creatures that dwell near the Dusk Throne. Oh, why did the gods ask this of me?

dialogue.name: GENTLEMAN02800
dialogue.text: Could you slay the creature in my stead? The udgan did not specify that the beast need be slain by my hand.

dialogue.name: GENTLEMAN02800
dialogue.text: Please, go to the Dusk Throne and slay any beasts you find. You are my only hope!

dialogue.name: GENTLEMAN02800
dialogue.text: Please, go to the Dusk Throne and slay any beasts you find.

dialogue.name: GENTLEMAN02800
dialogue.text: Tell me, what did you face?

dialogue.name: GENTLEMAN02800
dialogue.text: Ha ha, now I see why the gods gave me this task!

dialogue.name: GENTLEMAN02800
dialogue.text: I have been working on a set of armor ordered by a Budugan warrior for a few days now. However, no matter how hard I tried, I could not think of an appropriate design.

dialogue.name: GENTLEMAN02800
dialogue.text: But hearing you slayed an anala has made up my mind. I shall give the armor a fiery design! That should suit a brave warrior like him nicely.

dialogue.name: GENTLEMAN02800
dialogue.text: Thank you for all of your help. Do not hesitate to let me know in the future if you have a problem of your own! Perhaps the gods will be able to guide you too.
